name: Ghoul Evade
description:
Sneak your way through  a spooky graveyard filled with Ghouls. If they notice you, run for your life! Make it to the Church to win.

*Follow my progression in making this game (my first one!) on YouTube

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLO31ewJPSei5YaKpYenH1OQ5P7l_QjyOM
